scripts.generate: prisma format && bun prismaSchema:create && prisma generate --schema ./prisma/tmp.prisma && bun prismaSchema:delete
scripts.migrate: prisma format && bun prismaSchema:create && prisma migrate dev --schema ./prisma/tmp.prisma --name init && bun prismaSchema:delete
scripts.db:baseReset: prisma format && prisma migrate reset --force --schema ./prisma/tmp.prisma && prisma migrate dev --schema ./prisma/tmp.prisma --name init && bun prismaSchema:delete
